Disabled_Description: Setting to true disables the module
EditFileNameWithoutExtension_Description: If true, only filename can be changed when renaming file while extension is kept intact
ShowCommonSettings_Description: If true, allow for changing basic settings of files functionality, such as enabling table view and preview pane
ServerUrlRewriteBase_Description: Used for providing short URLs e.g. for file downloads, requires supplying rewrite rules in webserver config
ShowFilesApps_Description: Enables displaying information on desktop and mobile file storage apps in Files tab of Settings screen
BottomLeftCornerLinks_Description: Defines custom links shown at the bottom of left pane in Files
AvailableFor_Description: Automatically provide this feature if one of the listed modules is requested by the entry point
PublicLinksEnabled_Description: If true, allows for creating basic Public links in addition to secure ones
